title: lag spikes without ms increase
body:
It started 2 days ago and its constantly happening. I lose control over my champ for 2 to 3 seconds every 15 seconds. I tried fixing this issue by repairing and instaling the game again, log reader (doesn work) ... Even when im logging in i have to retry, because it says that because of an unexpected error i cant login and when i am successful everything is slow and glitchy. 

Please help!

replies.body: Losing control of your champs is a pretty good sign of packet loss, which means the data coming from your network is getting messed up somehow so our servers aren't able to read it correctly. Try running this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) to scan the latest game logs, and take a screenshot so we can go over it together.
